boltdir.description: Specify what Boltdir to load config from (default: autodiscovered from current working dir)

color.description: Whether to show output in color

compile_concurrency.description: Maximum number of simultaneous manifest block compiles (default: number of cores)

configfile.description: Specify where to load config from (default: ~/.puppetlabs/bolt/bolt.yaml)

credentials.description: Mapping of name to an object containing credential information

password.description: Password to authenticate with. Omit the value to prompt for the password.

private_key.description: Private ssh key to authenticate with

run_as.description: User to run as using privilege escalation

sudo_password.description: Password for privilege escalation. Omit the value to prompt for the password.

cwd.description: Current working directory where bolt will be executed

env.description: Environment variables to override when executing bolt

format.description: Output format to use: human or json

inventoryfile.description: Specify where to load inventory from (default: ~/.puppetlabs/bolt/inventory.yaml)

modulepath.description: List of directories containing modules, separated by ':'

ssl_verify.description: Verify remote host SSL certificate with WinRM

tmpdir.description: The directory to upload and execute temporary files on the target

transport.description: Specify a default transport: ssh, winrm, pcp, local

tty.description: Request a pseudo TTY on nodes that support it
